starwars

Interface SWEntityInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BenKenobi, Blaster, Canteen, Droid, DroidParts, LightSaber, Player, Reservoir, SWActor, SWEntity, SWLegend, SWRobots, TestActor, TuskenRaider

    public interface SWEntityInterface
extends EntityInterface
    All Entities and Actors in the starwars client package should implement this interface. It allows them to be managed by the EntityManager.
    Author:
    ram
    See Also:
    EntityInterface, EntityManager

    • Method Detail

      • getSymbol

        java.lang.String getSymbol()
        Returns a string symbol that represents this SWEntity or SWActor.

        The Views use this method to obtain the symbols that are used to query for resources(images) and for display.

        Returns:
        a String representing the SWEntity or SWActor.
        See Also:
        SWGridTextInterface

      • setSymbol

        void setSymbol(java.lang.String string)
        Sets the symbol of this SWEntity or SWActor with a new string string.

        Although not a must the new symbol is preferably,

        • single character
        • unique for each SWEntity or SWActor

        The Views use this method to obtain the symbols that are used to query for resources(images) and for display.

        Parameters:
        string - a string to represent this SWEntity or SWActor

      • hasCapability

        boolean hasCapability(Capability c)
        Returns true if this SWEntity or SWActor has the given capability c, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        c - the Capability to search for
        Returns:
        true if this Capability c is manifested, false otherwise
        See Also:
        Capability

      • getHitpoints

        int getHitpoints()
        Returns the hitpoints of this SWEntity or SWActor.
        Returns:
        the amount of hitpoints

      • getmaxHitpoints

        int getmaxHitpoints()
        Returns the maximum hitpoints of this SWEntity or SWActor.
        Returns:
        the amount of maxHitpoints

      • getLevel

        int getLevel()
        Returns the level of this SWEntity or SWActor.(currently only canteen uses this)
        Returns:
        the level

      • getForce

        int getForce()
        Returns the force ability level of this SWActor.
        Returns:
        the force ability level of this SWActor
        See Also:
        #forceAbilityLevel

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(int damage)
        Method that reduces the hitpoints to insist damage on of this SWEntity or SWActor.
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of hitpoints to be reduced
